name: Mania Lovely Pets Puzzle
description:
Mania Lovely Pets Puzzle is a deliciously sweet match-3 casual game.
Swap, Swipe and match 3 or more same magic animals to master the fun of casual match-3 game.
- Addictive and irresistible match-3 gameplay
- Unlock appetizing and delightful forest map
- 201 perplexing and puzzling forest levels
- Charming and cute Animals
